content: GF#16750. @Jay Lyle we had some discussion about this but me memory is that we didn't close it out. I'm not sure why "all the codes SHALL be unique" implies that "no formal distinction is possible between hierarchyMeaning is-a and classified-with"
Is this a question about how to define a DAG (for is-a) rather than just a tree? (Noting that's not actually the distinction between the two hierarchyMeanings)
disucssion has focused on the second not the first
